Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Oasis Cancun All Inclusive in Cancun (Avenida Kukulkan), you'll be minutes from Maya Cancun Museum and close to Delfines Beach. This all-inclusive resort is within close proximity of Aquaworld and Ballenas Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 1454 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as blackout drapes/curtains and in-room child care (surcharge).

Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as a nightclub and an outdoor pool. This resort also features concierge services, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride on the shuttle (surcharge), which operates within 16.5 km.

Dining
This resort is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's many dining establishments, which include 20 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/caf√©s. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit a beach bar or one of 20 bars/lounges, or 3 swim-up bars.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
This resort is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's many dining establishments, which include 20 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/caf√©s. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit a beach bar or one of 20 bars/lounges, or 3 swim-up bars.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 25 years old.

With a stay at Grand Oasis Cancun All Inclusive in Cancun (Avenida Kukulkan), you'll be minutes from Maya Cancun Museum and close to Delfines Beach. This all-inclusive resort is within close proximity of Aquaworld and Ballenas Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Maya Cancun Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Aquaworld - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Ballenas Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Delfines Beach - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
El Rey Ruins - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Luxury Avenue Shopping Mall - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Kukulcan Plaza Shopping Mall - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Marlin Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Tequila Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Cancun Interactive Aquarium - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
La Isla Shopping Mall - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Yamil Lu'um Archaeological Zone - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Cancun Golf Club at Pok Ta Pok - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Chac Mool Beach - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Forum By The Sea Mall - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Oasis Cancun All Inclusive is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi.

The preferred airport for Be Live Grand Cancun All Inclusive (formerly Oasis) is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi.
